title: Opera Girl by Vivienne Tam
summary: Inspired by Chinese Opera, Vivienne Tam created Opera Girl for the present-day.
description: “Opera Girl” is inspired by Chinese Opera.  Extending from its operatic theme, Vivienne Tam created “Opera Girl” for the modern generation through the magical world of Fashion.  “Opera Girl”  is festive, dramatic and romantic.  “Opera Girl” turns on the spot so she is always facing the current time.
descriptionHTML: “Opera Girl” is inspired by Chinese Opera.  Extending from its operatic theme, Vivienne Tam created “Opera Girl” for the modern generation through the magical world of Fashion.  “Opera Girl”  is festive, dramatic and romantic.  “Opera Girl” turns on the spot so she is always facing the current time.
comments: Doesn't work on Android Wear 2.0. I downloaded it but it hasn't shown up in any of my watch face apps to choose as an option. I can only assume it's not getting picked up because I'm on Android Wear 2.0. Shame, should say so in the description.
Amazing I thought it is going to be a boring watch face but I was amaze with the movements on my lg g watch. All I can say is cute Japanese movement.
This is so much better than just the time. The interactions are actually very fun, everyone See's this watch face when I am showing off the watch
I like it It is cute make some more
Cute. Needs date Doesn't eat battery. Cute animations. Needs an option for date and it would be perfect.
Not worked This app is not worked on fundo smart watch
recentChanges: - Touch on tap for every watch
